testcase.name: User navigates to Customer Quotation Dashboard page
testcase.system-out: Given the User is logged in with "http://192.168.150.20:8080/bottie_quote/login.html" already on the Customer Quotation Dashboard page.passed When the User navigates to the Customer Quotations Page By "mallikarjuna.ss" and "Malli@123karjuna".passed And verifies the existence and clickability of the side navigation bar......passed And verifies the existence of the quotation table with table headers........passed And verifies the existence and clickability of the Search button............passed And verifies the existence and clickability of the Create RFQ button........passed And verifies the existence of the Search Dropdown with a specific value.....passed And verifies the existence and clickability of the Clear button.............passed And verifies the exisistence of the search text box and confirms that the user can enter text.passed And verifies the presence of the Unimicron logo.............................passed And verifies the BQ title...................................................passed And verifies the application version........................................passed And verifies the existence of the language icon and confirms its clickability.passed And verifies the existence of the logout icon...............................passed Then click on the login icon, and the user is taken to the login page.......passed Then quit the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: User logs in to BQ Dashboard
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens a Chrome browser.......................................passed When the user enter to the BQ login "http://192.168.150.20:8080/bottie_quote/login.html".passed And varify title............................................................passed And varify LoginPage LargeBluebox...........................................passed And user will see With botti quote in bold latters..........................passed And placeholder as User Name................................................passed And placeholder as Password.................................................passed And by defult in English....................................................passed And enters the Username "mallikarjuna.ss"...................................passed And enters the password "Malli@123karjuna"..................................passed And clicks on the login button..............................................passed And succeful authentication mesg............................................passed And Unimicorn logo present..................................................passed Then the user should be on the BQ dashboard page............................passed Then quite the browser......................................................passed
